languages.text: {n}Потусторонняя сила утекает из вокса словно вода. Паскаль обращает к вам взгляд, и сквозь сверхразум проступают черты знакомого вам человека. Странным голосом, то ли испуганным, то ли просящим, то ли равнодушным, он интересуется:{/n} "Ты убьешь меня?"

{n}The otherworldly force drains from his vox like water. Pasqal turns to look at you, and you see the familiar features showing through the higher form of intelligence. In a strange voice that could equally be frightened, pleading, or indifferent, he enquires,{/n} "Are you going to kill me?"
languages.original_text: {n}Потусторонняя сила утекает из вокса словно вода. Паскаль обращает к вам взгляд, и сквозь сверхразум проступают черты знакомого вам человека. Странным голосом, то ли испуганным, то ли просящим, то ли равнодушным, он интересуется:{/n} "Ты убьешь меня?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The otherworldly force is drained from his vox like water. Pasqal turns to look at you, and familiar features show through the face of a higher form of intelligence. In a strange voice that could equally be frightened, pleading, or indifferent, he inquires,{/n} "Are you going to kill me?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

In a strange voice that could equally be frightened, pleading, or indifferent, he enquires,{/n} "Are you going to kill me?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}この世のものとは思えぬ力がパスカルのヴォクスから水のように溢れ出す。あなたに向き直ったパスカルは馴染みのある容貌だが、普段より高度な知性をにじませていた。聞き慣れない声は脅迫とも嘆願とも、あるいは無関心ともとれる調子を含ませ、彼は尋ねる。{/n}「自分を殺すつもりか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The otherworldly force drains from his vox like water. Pasqal turns to look at you, and you see the familiar features showing through the higher form of intelligence. In a strange voice that could equally be frightened, pleading, or indifferent, he enquires,{/n} "Are you going to kill me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}この世のものとは思えぬ力がパスカルのヴォクスから水のように溢れ出す。あなたに向き直ったパスカルは馴染みのある容貌だが、普段より高度な知性をにじませていた。聞き慣れない声は脅迫とも嘆願とも、あるいは無関心ともとれる調子を含ませ、彼は尋ねる。{/n}「自分を殺すつもりか？」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}超凡脱俗的力量仿佛流水一样，从他的音阵装置中流了出来。帕斯卡转过身，看着你。这张拥有至高智慧的面孔，此刻流露出了一丝熟悉的痕迹。他以奇怪的声音开了口，似乎带着惧怕、恳求与冷漠。{/n}“你要杀死我吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}The otherworldly force drains from his vox like water. Pasqal turns to look at you, and you see the familiar features showing through the higher form of intelligence. In a strange voice that could equally be frightened, pleading, or indifferent, he enquires,{/n} "Are you going to kill me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}超凡脱俗的力量仿佛流水一样，从他的音阵装置中流了出来。帕斯卡转过身，看着你。这张拥有至高智慧的面孔，此刻流露出了一丝熟悉的痕迹。他以奇怪的声音开了口，似乎带着惧怕、恳求与冷漠。{/n}“你要杀死我吗？”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La force surnaturelle semble soudain disparaître de son vox. Pasqal se tourne vers vous, et bien que son visage arbore les traits d'une forme d'intelligence supérieure, vous y décelez des expressions familières.{/n} « Allez-vous me tuer ? » {n}vous demande-t-il simplement. Vous ne sauriez dire s'il est effrayé, implorant ou indifférent à la situation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The otherworldly force drains from his vox like water. Pasqal turns to look at you, and you see the familiar features showing through the higher form of intelligence. In a strange voice that could equally be frightened, pleading, or indifferent, he enquires,{/n} "Are you going to kill me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La force surnaturelle semble soudain disparaître de son vox. Pasqal se tourne vers vous, et bien que son visage arbore les traits d'une forme d'intelligence supérieure, vous y décelez des expressions familières.{/n} « Allez-vous me tuer ? » {n}vous demande-t-il simplement. Vous ne sauriez dire s'il est effrayé, implorant ou indifférent à la situation.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Una voz sobrenatural brota de su voco como si fuera un torrente de agua. Pasqal se gira para mirarte y detectas rasgos conocidos en la cara de la inteligencia superior. Con una voz extraña, que podría ser tanto de miedo, ruego o indiferencia, pregunta:{/n} «¿Va a matarme?».
languages.original_text: {n}The otherworldly force drains from his vox like water. Pasqal turns to look at you, and you see the familiar features showing through the higher form of intelligence. In a strange voice that could equally be frightened, pleading, or indifferent, he enquires,{/n} "Are you going to kill me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Una voz sobrenatural brota de su voco como si fuera un torrente de agua. Pasqal se gira para mirarte y en la cara de una forma superior de inteligencia detectas rasgos conocidos. Con una voz extraña, que podría ser tanto de miedo, ruego o indiferencia, pregunta:{/n} «¿Va a matarme?».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die andersweltliche Kraft fließt aus seinem Vox wie Wasser Pasqal blickt dich an. Vertraute Züge schimmern durch die höhere Form der Intelligenz hindurch. In einer merkwürdigen Stimme, die zu gleichen Teilen verängstigt, flehentlich oder gleichgültig sein könnte, erkundigt er sich:{/n} "Werdet Ihr mich töten?"
languages.original_text: {n}The otherworldly force drains from his vox like water. Pasqal turns to look at you, and you see the familiar features showing through the higher form of intelligence. In a strange voice that could equally be frightened, pleading, or indifferent, he enquires,{/n} "Are you going to kill me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die andersweltliche Kraft fließt aus seinem Vox wie Wasser Pasqal blickt dich an. Vertraute Züge schimmern durch das Gesicht einer höheren Form der Intelligenz. In einer merkwürdigen Stimme, die zu gleichen Teilen verängstigt, flehentlich oder gleichgültig sein könnte, erkundigt er sich:{/n} "Werdet Ihr mich töten?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Dünya dışı ses, voksundaki su gibi çekiliyor. Pasqal, dönüp sana bakıyor. Üst aklın ardındaki tanıdık hatlarını görebiliyorsun. Hem korkutucu, hem yakarıcı hem de hissiz olarak değerlendirilebilecek bir tınıyla soruyor.{/n} "Beni öldürecek misiniz?"
languages.original_text: {n}The otherworldly force drains from his vox like water. Pasqal turns to look at you, and you see the familiar features showing through the higher form of intelligence. In a strange voice that could equally be frightened, pleading, or indifferent, he enquires,{/n} "Are you going to kill me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Voksundaki dünya dışı ses su gibi çekiliyor. Pasqal dönerek sana bakıyor ve üst bilişsel biçimin arkasındaki tanıdık hatlarını görebiliyorsun. Eşit derecede korkutucu, yakarıcı veya hissiz olarak değerlendirilebilecek bir sesle soruyor:{/n} "Beni öldürecek misiniz?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
